items.title: Dota 2
items.description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena by Valve. The game is a sequel to Defense of the Ancients, which was a community-created mod for Blizzard Entertainment's Warcraft III.

items.title: Fortnite
items.description: Battle royale where 100 players fight to be the last person standing. which was a community-created mod for Blizzard Entertainment's Warcraft III.

items.title: Far Cry 5
items.description: Far Cry 5 is a 2018 first-person shooter game developed by Ubisoft. which was a community-created mod for Blizzard Entertainment's Warcraft III.
